card.name: Æther Mutation
card.ability: Return target creature to its owner's hand. Put X 1/1 green Saproling creature tokens onto the battlefield, where X is that creature's converted mana cost.
card.ruling: 10/4/2004 : You only put the tokens onto the battlefield if the target creature is still a legal target on resolution.

card.name: Ana Disciple
card.ability:
{U}, {T}: Target creature gains flying until end of turn.
{B}, {T}: Target creature gets -2/-0 until end of turn.
card.flavor: "The blessings of Gaea alone are no longer enough."

card.name: Ana Sanctuary
card.ability: At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control a blue or black permanent, target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn. If you control a blue permanent and a black permanent, that creature gets +5/+5 until end of turn instead.
card.ruling: 10/4/2004 : The creature either gets +1/+1 or +5/+5, never +6/+6.

card.name: Anavolver
card.ability:
Kicker {1}{U} and/or {B} (You may pay an additional {1}{U} and/or {B} as you cast this spell.)
If Anavolver was kicked with its {1}{U} kicker, it enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it and with flying.
If Anavolver was kicked with its {B} kicker, it enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it and with "Pay 3 life: Regenerate Anavolver."

card.name: Angelfire Crusader
card.ability: {R}: Angelfire Crusader gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
card.flavor: Nothing burns hotter than the fires of holy rage.

card.name: Battlefield Forge
card.ability:
{T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.
{T}: Add {R} or {W} to your mana pool. Battlefield Forge deals 1 damage to you.

card.name: Bloodfire Colossus
card.ability: {R}, Sacrifice Bloodfire Colossus: Bloodfire Colossus deals 6 damage to each creature and each player.
card.flavor: It took all its strength to contain the fire within.

card.name: Bloodfire Dwarf
card.ability: {R}, Sacrifice Bloodfire Dwarf: Bloodfire Dwarf deals 1 damage to each creature without flying.
card.flavor: For them, the only honorable death is one that leaves a crater.

card.name: Bloodfire Infusion
card.ability:
Enchant creature you control
{R}, Sacrifice enchanted creature: Bloodfire Infusion deals damage equal to the sacrificed creature's power to each creature.
card.ruling: 10/4/2004 : If this card is ever on a creature you don't control, it is put into the graveyard as a State-Based Action.

card.name: Bloodfire Kavu
card.ability: {R}, Sacrifice Bloodfire Kavu: Bloodfire Kavu deals 2 damage to each creature.
card.flavor: Heart of fire, blood of lava, teeth of stone.

card.name: Bog Gnarr
card.ability: Whenever a player casts a black spell, Bog Gnarr gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
card.flavor: Not all of Dominaria's defenders were nourished by the light.

card.name: Brass Herald
card.ability:
As Brass Herald enters the battlefield, choose a creature type.
When Brass Herald enters the battlefield, reveal the top four cards of your library. Put all creature cards of the chosen type revealed this way into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.
Creatures of the chosen type get +1/+1.
card.ruling: 10/4/2004 : You must choose a creature type that already exists in Magic.

card.name: Captain's Maneuver
card.ability: The next X damage that would be dealt to target creature or player this turn is dealt to another target creature or player instead.
card.flavor: Sisay discovered that the mirrored hull of the Weatherlight could be used as a defensive weapon.
card.ruling:
10/4/2004 : If the second target is no longer on the battlefield, or if the second target is no longer a creature or player when the damage would be redirected, the damage is dealt to the first target as if this spell was not cast.
10/4/2004 : If the first target is no longer on the battlefield, then the damage will not be dealt at all, so it can't be redirected by this ability.

card.name: Caves of Koilos
card.ability:
{T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.
{T}: Add {W} or {B} to your mana pool. Caves of Koilos deals 1 damage to you.

card.name: Ceta Disciple
card.ability:
{R}, {T}: Target creature gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
{G}, {T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.
card.flavor: "The sea holds all that you need. You simply must know how to ask for it."

card.name: Ceta Sanctuary
card.ability: At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control a red or green permanent, draw a card, then discard a card. If you control a red permanent and a green permanent, instead draw two cards, then discard a card.
card.ruling: 10/4/2004 : The ability has you draw one or two cards, but never three.

card.name: Cetavolver
card.ability:
Kicker {1}{R} and/or {G} (You may pay an additional {1}{R} and/or {G} as you cast this spell.)
If Cetavolver was kicked with its {1}{R} kicker, it enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it and with first strike.
If Cetavolver was kicked with its {G} kicker, it enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it and with trample.

card.name: Order // Chaos
card.ability:
Exile target attacking creature.
//
Creatures can't block this turn.
card.artist: Greg & Tim Hildebrandt // Greg & Tim Hildebrandt

card.name: Coalition Flag
card.ability:
Enchant creature you control
Enchanted creature is a Flagbearer.
While choosing targets as part of casting a spell or activating an ability, your opponents must choose at least one Flagbearer on the battlefield if able.
card.ruling: 10/4/2004 : If this card is ever on a creature you don't control, it is put into the graveyard as a State-Based Action.

card.name: Coalition Honor Guard
card.ability: While choosing targets as part of casting a spell or activating an ability, your opponents must choose at least one Flagbearer on the battlefield if able.
card.flavor: Giving little thought to their own defense, they carried the flag that united their army.

card.name: Coastal Drake
card.ability:
Flying
{1}{U}, {T}: Return target Kavu to its owner's hand.
card.flavor: When the kavu emerged from their ancient nests, food chains long dormant became vibrant again.

card.name: Consume Strength
card.ability: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Another target creature gets -2/-2 until end of turn.
card.flavor: As Multani's troops invaded Urborg, the decay of the swamp became a feast for the living.

card.name: Cromat
card.ability:
{W}{B}: Destroy target creature blocking or blocked by Cromat.
{U}{R}: Cromat gains flying until end of turn.
{B}{G}: Regenerate Cromat.
{R}{W}: Cromat gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
{G}{U}: Put Cromat on top of its owner's library.

card.name: Night // Day
card.ability:
Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.
//
Creatures target player controls get +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Dead Ringers
card.ability: Destroy two target nonblack creatures unless either one is a color the other isn't. They can't be regenerated.
card.flavor: "Beautiful, isn't it?" crowed Crovax. "They fought together. Now they will die together."
card.ruling:
10/4/2004 : Both of the target creatures must be exactly the same color or combination of colors. Both being colorless is also okay. If they differ in any way, you can still cast the spell, but it does not do anything on resolution.
10/4/2004 : Colors are checked on resolution.
10/4/2004 : If one of the targets left the battlefield before resolution, use the colors it had at the time it left the battlefield for the comparison.
10/4/2004 : If one of the targets became an illegal target before resolution, this spell will still check the color of that target even though it will not destroy that target.

card.name: Life // Death
card.ability:
All lands you control become 1/1 creatures until end of turn. They're still lands.
//
Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. You lose life equal to its converted mana cost.
card.artist: Edward P. Beard, Jr. // Edward P. Beard, Jr.

card.name: Death Grasp
card.ability: Death Grasp deals X damage to target creature or player. You gain X life.
card.flavor: Yawgmoth's greatest joy came from watching one hero defeat another.

card.name: Death Mutation
card.ability: Destroy target nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated. Put X 1/1 green Saproling creature tokens onto the battlefield, where X is that creature's converted mana cost.
card.ruling: 8/1/2008 : If the target is illegal on resolution, the entire spell is countered. As such, you will not put any tokens onto the battlefield.

card.name: Dega Disciple
card.ability:
{B}, {T}: Target creature gets -2/-0 until end of turn.
{R}, {T}: Target creature gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
card.flavor: "There is no true equity of power. There is only more and less."

card.name: Dega Sanctuary
card.ability: At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control a black or red permanent, you gain 2 life. If you control a black permanent and a red permanent, you gain 4 life instead.
card.ruling: 10/4/2004 : You can gain 2 or 4 life, but never 6.

card.name: Degavolver
card.ability:
Kicker {1}{B} and/or {R} (You may pay an additional {1}{B} and/or {R} as you cast this spell.)
If Degavolver was kicked with its {1}{B} kicker, it enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it and with "Pay 3 life: Regenerate Degavolver."
If Degavolver was kicked with its {R} kicker, it enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it and with first strike.

card.name: Desolation Angel
card.ability:
Kicker {W}{W} (You may pay an additional {W}{W} as you cast this spell.)
Flying
When Desolation Angel enters the battlefield, destroy all lands you control. If it was kicked, destroy all lands instead.

card.name: Desolation Giant
card.ability:
Kicker {W}{W} (You may pay an additional {W}{W} as you cast this spell.)
When Desolation Giant enters the battlefield, destroy all other creatures you control. If it was kicked, destroy all other creatures instead.

card.name: Diversionary Tactics
card.ability: Tap two untapped creatures you control: Tap target creature.
card.flavor: "It's the oldest trick in the book," said Guff. "And I ought to know—I wrote it."

card.name: Divine Light
card.ability: Prevent all damage that would be dealt this turn to creatures you control.
card.flavor:
"Phyrexia is an unforgiving place, and I am an angry lord in an unforgiving mood."
—Lord Windgrace

card.name: Dodecapod
card.ability: If a spell or ability an opponent controls causes you to discard Dodecapod, put it onto the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it instead of putting it into your graveyard.

card.name: Dragon Arch
card.ability: {2}, {T}: You may put a multicolored creature card from your hand onto the battlefield.
card.flavor: In their hunger for the arch's power, mages often forget that it only makes dragons easier to summon. It doesn't make them easier to control.
card.ruling:
10/4/2004 : A multicolored card has more than one color in its mana cost.
5/1/2007 : Putting the card onto the battlefield is optional.  When the ability resolves, you can choose not to.

card.name: Dwarven Landslide
card.ability:
Kicker—{2}{R}, Sacrifice a land. (You may pay {2}{R} and sacrifice a land in addition to any other costs as you cast this spell.)
Destroy target land. If Dwarven Landslide was kicked, destroy another target land.

card.name: Dwarven Patrol
card.ability:
Dwarven Patrol doesn't untap during your untap step.
Whenever you cast a nonred spell, untap Dwarven Patrol.
card.flavor: Dwarves never worry about who watches their backs.
card.ruling: 10/4/2004 : Remember that lands are not spells.

card.name: Ebony Treefolk
card.ability: {B}{G}: Ebony Treefolk gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
card.flavor: Its roots are equally happy to drink the water of a clear stream or the oily blood of a Phyrexian warrior.

card.name: Emblazoned Golem
card.ability:
Kicker {X} (You may pay an additional {X} as you cast this spell.)
Spend only colored mana on X. No more than one mana of each color may be spent this way.
If Emblazoned Golem was kicked, it enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it.

card.name: Enlistment Officer
card.ability:
First strike
When Enlistment Officer enters the battlefield, reveal the top four cards of your library. Put all Soldier cards revealed this way into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

card.name: Evasive Action
card.ability: Domain — Counter target spell unless its controller pays {1} for each basic land type among lands you control.
card.flavor: Effective use of terrain is a lesson good commanders learn quickly.
card.ruling:
2/1/2009 : To determine the number of basic land types among lands you control, look at the lands you have on the battlefield and ask yourself whether the subtypes Plains, Island, Swamp, Mountain, and Forest appear within that group. The number of times you say yes (topping out at five) tells you how powerful your domain abilities will be.
2/1/2009 : How many lands you control of a particular basic land type is irrelevant to a domain ability, as long as that number is greater than zero. As far as domain is concerned, ten Forests is the same as one Forest.
2/1/2009 : A number of nonbasic lands have basic land types. Domain abilities don't count the number of lands you control -- they count the number of basic land types among lands you control, even if that means checking the same land twice. For example, if you control a Tundra, an Overgrown Tomb, and a Madblind Mountain, you'll have a Plains, Island, Swamp, Mountain, and Forest among the lands you control. Your domain abilities will be maxed out.

card.name: False Dawn
card.ability:
Until end of turn, spells and abilities you control that would add colored mana to your mana pool add that much white mana instead. Until end of turn, you may spend white mana as though it were mana of any color.
Draw a card.
card.ruling:
10/4/2004 : This card's ability does not change the color of any permanents.
10/4/2004 : This card's ability does not change any lands into Plains.

card.name: Fervent Charge
card.ability: Whenever a creature you control attacks, it gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
card.flavor: Crovax was nearly buried beneath the weight of his opponents.

card.name: Fire // Ice
card.ability:
Fire deals 2 damage divided as you choose among one or two target creatures and/or players.
//
Tap target permanent.
Draw a card.

card.name: Flowstone Charger
card.ability: Whenever Flowstone Charger attacks, it gets +3/-3 until end of turn.
card.flavor: A mane of flowstone and a mien of fury.

card.name: Foul Presence
card.ability:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets -1/-1 and has "{T}: Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn."
card.flavor: The Phyrexians have one word that means both "evolution" and "pain."

card.name: Fungal Shambler
card.ability:
Trample
Whenever Fungal Shambler deals damage to an opponent, you draw a card and that opponent discards a card.

card.name: Gaea's Balance
card.ability:
As an additional cost to cast Gaea's Balance, sacrifice five lands.
Search your library for a land card of each basic land type and put them onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.
card.ruling:
10/4/2004 : You can find a nonbasic land card this way as long as it has a basic land type, such as Stomping Ground.
10/4/2004 : You can fail to find a land card for any or all basic land types, even if a land card with that basic land type is in your library.

card.name: Gaea's Skyfolk
card.ability: Flying
card.flavor: The grace of the forest and the spirit of the sea.

card.name: Gerrard Capashen
card.ability:
At the beginning of your upkeep, you gain 1 life for each card in target opponent's hand.
{3}{W}: Tap target creature. Activate this ability only if Gerrard Capashen is attacking.

card.name: Gerrard's Verdict
card.ability: Target player discards two cards. You gain 3 life for each land card discarded this way.
card.flavor: A heart of light and a soul of darkness cannot coexist.

card.name: Glade Gnarr
card.ability: Whenever a player casts a blue spell, Glade Gnarr gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
card.flavor: Long thought merely a legend, the appearance of the gnarr was seen by the defenders as a sign of good luck.

card.name: Goblin Legionnaire
card.ability:
{R}, Sacrifice Goblin Legionnaire: Goblin Legionnaire deals 2 damage to target creature or player.
{W}, Sacrifice Goblin Legionnaire: Prevent the next 2 damage that would be dealt to target creature or player this turn.

card.name: Goblin Ringleader
card.ability:
Haste
When Goblin Ringleader enters the battlefield, reveal the top four cards of your library. Put all Goblin cards revealed this way into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

card.name: Goblin Trenches
card.ability: {2}, Sacrifice a land: Put two 1/1 red and white Goblin Soldier creature tokens onto the battlefield.
card.flavor: The ground rose and formed into thousands of tiny warriors. This fight was far from over.
card.ruling: 10/4/2004 : The tokens are named "Goblin Soldier" and have the creature types "Goblin" and "Soldier".

card.name: Grave Defiler
card.ability:
When Grave Defiler enters the battlefield, reveal the top four cards of your library. Put all Zombie cards revealed this way into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.
{1}{B}: Regenerate Grave Defiler.

card.name: Guided Passage
card.ability: Reveal the cards in your library. An opponent chooses from among them a creature card, a land card, and a noncreature, nonland card. You put the chosen cards into your hand. Then shuffle your library.
card.ruling:
10/4/2004 : If you have no cards of any of the specified card types, then ignore those types and the opponent only selects cards of the types you do have.
10/4/2004 : Yes, your opponents get to look at all the cards in your library.

card.name: Haunted Angel
card.ability:
Flying
When Haunted Angel dies, exile Haunted Angel and each other player puts a 3/3 black Angel creature token with flying onto the battlefield.

card.name: Helionaut
card.ability:
Flying
{1}, {T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.
card.flavor: Hope kept the defenders aloft, but only courage kept them in the fight.

card.name: Ice Cave
card.ability: Whenever a player casts a spell, any other player may pay that spell's mana cost. If a player does, counter the spell. (Mana cost includes color.)
card.flavor: Even the oppresive cold of the cave could not temper Eladamri's ire.
card.ruling: 10/4/2004 : The mana cost does not include cost increases or reductions.

card.name: Illuminate
card.ability:
Kicker {2}{R} and/or {3}{U} (You may pay an additional {2}{R} and/or {3}{U} as you cast this spell.)
Illuminate deals X damage to target creature. If Illuminate was kicked with its {2}{R} kicker, it deals X damage to that creature's controller. If Illuminate was kicked with its {3}{U} kicker, you draw X cards.

card.name: Illusion // Reality
card.ability:
Target spell or permanent becomes the color of your choice until end of turn.
//
Destroy target artifact.

card.name: Index
card.ability: Look at the top five cards of your library, then put them back in any order.
card.flavor: "Let's see . . . Mercadia, mercenary, merfolk . . . you know, I really need a better filing system."

card.name: Jaded Response
card.ability: Counter target spell if it shares a color with a creature you control.
card.flavor:
"Calm down everyone; it's nothing we haven't seen before."
—Sisay
card.ruling: 10/4/2004 : It does not check colors until it resolves.

card.name: Jilt
card.ability:
Kicker {1}{R} (You may pay an additional {1}{R} as you cast this spell.)
Return target creature to its owner's hand. If Jilt was kicked, it deals 2 damage to another target creature.
card.flavor:
"You're not my Hanna"
—Gerrard, to Yawgmoth

card.name: Jungle Barrier
card.ability:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)
When Jungle Barrier enters the battlefield, draw a card.
card.flavor: A massive pull of mana caused all of Dominaria to pause—Multani had transplanted Yavimaya to Urborg's edge.

card.name: Kavu Glider
card.ability:
{W}: Kavu Glider gets +0/+1 until end of turn.
{U}: Kavu Glider gains flying until end of turn.

card.name: Kavu Howler
card.ability: When Kavu Howler enters the battlefield, reveal the top four cards of your library. Put all Kavu cards revealed this way into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

card.name: Kavu Mauler
card.ability:
Trample
Whenever Kavu Mauler attacks, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each other attacking Kavu.
card.flavor: To the kavu, all Phyrexians are merely crunchy snacks.

card.name: Last Caress
card.ability:
Target player loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.
Draw a card.

card.name: Last Stand
card.ability: Target opponent loses 2 life for each Swamp you control. Last Stand deals damage equal to the number of Mountains you control to target creature. Put a 1/1 green Saproling creature token onto the battlefield for each Forest you control. You gain 2 life for each Plains you control. Draw a card for each Island you control, then discard that many cards.

card.name: Lay of the Land
card.ability: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal that card, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.
card.flavor: Victory favors neither the righteous nor the wicked. It favors the prepared.
card.ruling: 10/4/2004 : Because the "search" requires you to find a card with certain characteristics, you don't have to find the card if you don't want to.

card.name: Legacy Weapon
card.ability:
{W}{U}{B}{R}{G}: Exile target permanent.
If Legacy Weapon would be put into a graveyard from anywhere, reveal Legacy Weapon and shuffle it into its owner's library instead.

card.name: Lightning Angel
card.ability: Flying, vigilance, haste

card.name: Living Airship
card.ability:
Flying
{2}{G}: Regenerate Living Airship.
card.flavor: The ship has a crew of three: the pilot, the gunner, and the ship itself.

card.name: Llanowar Dead
card.ability: {T}: Add {B} to your mana pool.
card.flavor: Just as leaves fall from the branches of a living tree, so too do the dead leave the elfhame.

card.name: Llanowar Wastes
card.ability:
{T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.
{T}: Add {B} or {G} to your mana pool. Llanowar Wastes deals 1 damage to you.

card.name: Manacles of Decay
card.ability:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature can't attack.
{B}: Enchanted creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.
{R}: Enchanted creature can't block this turn.

card.name: Martyrs' Tomb
card.ability: Pay 2 life: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to target creature this turn.
card.flavor:
Honor the brave who fought,
Honor the dead who fell,
Honor the world they saved.
—Memorial inscription

card.name: Mask of Intolerance
card.ability: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, if there are four or more basic land types among lands that player controls, Mask of Intolerance deals 3 damage to him or her.

card.name: Mind Extraction
card.ability:
As an additional cost to cast Mind Extraction, sacrifice a creature.
Target player reveals his or her hand and discards all cards of each of the sacrificed creature's colors.
card.ruling:
10/4/2004 : If you sacrifice a colorless creature, you get to see their hand but they discard no cards.
10/4/2004 : If you sacrifice a multicolored creature, all cards that share at least one color with the creature are discarded.
4/15/2013 : You must sacrifice exactly one creature to cast this spell; you cannot cast it without sacrificing a creature, and you cannot sacrifice additional creatures.
4/15/2013 : Players can only respond once this spell has been cast and all its costs have been paid. No one can try to destroy the creature you sacrificed to prevent you from casting this spell.

card.name: Minotaur Illusionist
card.ability:
{1}{U}: Minotaur Illusionist gains shroud until end of turn. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities.)
{R}, Sacrifice Minotaur Illusionist: Minotaur Illusionist deals damage equal to its power to target creature.

card.name: Minotaur Tactician
card.ability:
Haste
Minotaur Tactician gets +1/+1 as long as you control a white creature.
Minotaur Tactician gets +1/+1 as long as you control a blue creature.

card.name: Mournful Zombie
card.ability: {W}, {T}: Target player gains 1 life.
card.flavor: Treated with a powerful mix of herbs and potions, its wrappings have a remarkable preservative effect, even for the living.

card.name: Mystic Snake
card.ability:
Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)
When Mystic Snake enters the battlefield, counter target spell.
card.flavor: Its fangs are in your flesh before its hiss leaves your ears.

card.name: Necra Disciple
card.ability:
{G}, {T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.
{W}, {T}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to target creature or player this turn.
card.flavor: "The darkness merely hides the light."

card.name: Necra Sanctuary
card.ability: At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control a green or white permanent, target player loses 1 life. If you control a green permanent and a white permanent, that player loses 3 life instead.
card.ruling:
10/4/2004 : It can make a player lose 0, 1, or 3 life, but never 4.
10/4/2004 : One permanent that is both white and green will cause the player to be affected by the lose 3 life portion.

card.name: Necravolver
card.ability:
Kicker {1}{G} and/or {W} (You may pay an additional {1}{G} and/or {W} as you cast this spell.)
If Necravolver was kicked with its {1}{G} kicker, it enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it and with trample.
If Necravolver was kicked with its {W} kicker, it enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it and with "Whenever Necravolver deals damage, you gain that much life."

card.name: Orim's Thunder
card.ability:
Kicker {R} (You may pay an additional {R} as you cast this spell.)
Destroy target artifact or enchantment. If Orim's Thunder was kicked, it deals damage equal to that permanent's converted mana cost to target creature.

card.name: Overgrown Estate
card.ability: Sacrifice a land: You gain 3 life.
card.flavor: The decay of Crovax's ancestral home matched the state of his soul.

card.name: Penumbra Bobcat
card.ability: When Penumbra Bobcat dies, put a 2/1 black Cat creature token onto the battlefield.
card.flavor: This cat has two lives and it's hunting for more.

card.name: Penumbra Kavu
card.ability: When Penumbra Kavu dies, put a 3/3 black Kavu creature token onto the battlefield.
card.flavor:
"These kavu are so stubborn they even refuse to die."
—Tahngarth

card.name: Penumbra Wurm
card.ability:
Trample
When Penumbra Wurm dies, put a 6/6 black Wurm creature token with trample onto the battlefield.

card.name: Pernicious Deed
card.ability: {X}, Sacrifice Pernicious Deed: Destroy each artifact, creature, and enchantment with converted mana cost X or less.
card.flavor: "Yawgmoth," Freyalise whispered as she set the bomb, "now you will pay for your treachery."

card.name: Phyrexian Arena
card.ability: At the beginning of your upkeep, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.
card.flavor: An audience of one with the malice of thousands.

card.name: Phyrexian Gargantua
card.ability: When Phyrexian Gargantua enters the battlefield, you draw two cards and you lose 2 life.
card.flavor: Other Phyrexians have nightmares about the gargantua.

card.name: Phyrexian Rager
card.ability: When Phyrexian Rager enters the battlefield, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.
card.flavor: It takes no prisoners, but it keeps the choicest bits for Phyrexia.

card.name: Planar Despair
card.ability: Domain — All creatures get -1/-1 until end of turn for each basic land type among lands you control.
card.flavor: All of Dominaria recoiled as Yawgmoth and his retainers arrived.
card.ruling:
2/1/2009 : To determine the number of basic land types among lands you control, look at the lands you have on the battlefield and ask yourself whether the subtypes Plains, Island, Swamp, Mountain, and Forest appear within that group. The number of times you say yes (topping out at five) tells you how powerful your domain abilities will be.
2/1/2009 : How many lands you control of a particular basic land type is irrelevant to a domain ability, as long as that number is greater than zero. As far as domain is concerned, ten Forests is the same as one Forest.
2/1/2009 : A number of nonbasic lands have basic land types. Domain abilities don't count the number of lands you control -- they count the number of basic land types among lands you control, even if that means checking the same land twice. For example, if you control a Tundra, an Overgrown Tomb, and a Madblind Mountain, you'll have a Plains, Island, Swamp, Mountain, and Forest among the lands you control. Your domain abilities will be maxed out.

card.name: Powerstone Minefield
card.ability: Whenever a creature attacks or blocks, Powerstone Minefield deals 2 damage to it.
card.flavor:
"We have fought this far and lost too much. We will not turn back."
—Grizzlegom

card.name: Prophetic Bolt
card.ability: Prophetic Bolt deals 4 damage to target creature or player. Look at the top four cards of your library. Put one of those cards into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

card.name: Putrid Warrior
card.ability: Whenever Putrid Warrior deals damage, choose one — Each player loses 1 life; or each player gains 1 life.
card.flavor: "I do not like it," said Grizzlegom, "but I will take every soldier I can get."

card.name: Quagmire Druid
card.ability: {G}, {T}, Sacrifice a creature: Destroy target enchantment.
card.flavor: As the druids had devoted their lives to preserving Dominaria, so did they devote their deaths.

card.name: Quicksilver Dagger
card.ability:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has "{T}: This creature deals 1 damage to target player. You draw a card."
card.flavor: The dwarves call their quicksilver techniques "improvisational weaponsmithing."

card.name: Raka Disciple
card.ability:
{W}, {T}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to target creature or player this turn.
{U}, {T}: Target creature gains flying until end of turn.
card.flavor: "The strong can also be subtle."

card.name: Raka Sanctuary
card.ability: At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control a white or blue permanent, Raka Sanctuary deals 1 damage to target creature. If you control a white permanent and a blue permanent, Raka Sanctuary deals 3 damage to that creature instead.
card.ruling: 10/4/2004 : It can deal 1 or 3 damage, but never 4.

card.name: Rakavolver
card.ability:
Kicker {1}{W} and/or {U} (You may pay an additional {1}{W} and/or {U} as you cast this spell.)
If Rakavolver was kicked with its {1}{W} kicker, it enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it and with "Whenever Rakavolver deals damage, you gain that much life."
If Rakavolver was kicked with its {U} kicker, it enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it and with flying.

card.name: Razorfin Hunter
card.ability: {T}: Razorfin Hunter deals 1 damage to target creature or player.
card.flavor: No one knew if they'd been lurking under the sea all along, or if they'd been created by the Phyrexian overlay.

card.name: Reef Shaman
card.ability: {T}: Target land becomes the basic land type of your choice until end of turn.
card.flavor: With one gesture, she can render a thousand years of navigational charts obsolete.

card.name: Savage Gorilla
card.ability: {U}{B}, {T}, Sacrifice Savage Gorilla: Target creature gets -3/-3 until end of turn. Draw a card.
card.flavor: These omnivorous gorillas have no qualms about a diet composed of equal parts fruit and Phyrexians.
card.ruling: 10/4/2004 : You do not get to draw a card if the target is not legal on resolution.

card.name: Shield of Duty and Reason
card.ability:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has protection from green and from blue.
card.flavor: The duty: to defend. The reason: to survive.

card.name: Shimmering Mirage
card.ability:
Target land becomes the basic land type of your choice until end of turn.
Draw a card.
card.flavor:
"Oh, is that all you need? Why didn't you just say so?"
—Reef shaman

card.name: Shivan Reef
card.ability:
{T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.
{T}: Add {U} or {R} to your mana pool. Shivan Reef deals 1 damage to you.

card.name: Smash
card.ability:
Destroy target artifact.
Draw a card.
card.flavor:
"They're ugly, and they're in my way."
—Tahngarth

card.name: Soul Link
card.ability:
Enchant creature
Whenever enchanted creature deals damage, you gain that much life.
Whenever enchanted creature is dealt damage, you gain that much life.
card.flavor: They danced like puppets to a tune only Yawgmoth could hear.
card.ruling: 10/4/2004 : If the creature damages itself, both abilities trigger.

card.name: Spectral Lynx
card.ability:
Protection from green
{B}: Regenerate Spectral Lynx.
card.flavor: A shadowy version of its corporeal cousin, this lynx hunts souls, not meals.

card.name: Spiritmonger
card.ability:
Whenever Spiritmonger deals damage to a creature, put a +1/+1 counter on Spiritmonger.
{B}: Regenerate Spiritmonger.
{G}: Spiritmonger becomes the color of your choice until end of turn.

card.name: Squee's Embrace
card.ability:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2.
When enchanted creature dies, return that card to its owner's hand.

card.name: Squee's Revenge
card.ability: Choose a number. Flip a coin that many times or until you lose a flip, whichever comes first. If you win all the flips, draw two cards for each flip.

card.name: Standard Bearer
card.ability: While choosing targets as part of casting a spell or activating an ability, your opponents must choose at least one Flagbearer on the battlefield if able.
card.flavor: The standard was a rallying point for the army and a target for the enemy.

card.name: Strength of Night
card.ability:
Kicker {B} (You may pay an additional {B} as you cast this spell.)
Creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn. If Strength of Night was kicked, Zombie creatures you control get an additional +2/+2 until end of turn.

card.name: Suffocating Blast
card.ability: Counter target spell and Suffocating Blast deals 3 damage to target creature.

card.name: Suppress
card.ability: Target player exiles all cards from his or her hand face down. At the beginning of the end step of that player's next turn, that player returns those cards to his or her hand.
card.artist: Terese Nielsen and Thomas M. Baxa

card.name: Sylvan Messenger
card.ability:
Trample
When Sylvan Messenger enters the battlefield, reveal the top four cards of your library. Put all Elf cards revealed this way into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

card.name: Symbiotic Deployment
card.ability:
Skip your draw step.
{1}, Tap two untapped creatures you control: Draw a card.
card.flavor:
"You know your orders. I know your hearts. Now the stronghold will know defeat."
—Eladamri

card.name: Tahngarth's Glare
card.ability: Look at the top three cards of target opponent's library, then put them back in any order. That player looks at the top three cards of your library, then puts them back in any order.

card.name: Temporal Spring
card.ability: Put target permanent on top of its owner's library.
card.flavor: One splash of the spring's water knocks you clear into last week.

card.name: Tidal Courier
card.ability:
When Tidal Courier enters the battlefield, reveal the top four cards of your library. Put all Merfolk cards revealed this way into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.
{3}{U}: Tidal Courier gains flying until end of turn.

card.name: Tranquil Path
card.ability:
Destroy all enchantments.
Draw a card.
card.flavor: Freyalise bought the planeswalkers the time they needed by clearing a path through the misshapen hell of Phyrexia.

card.name: Tundra Kavu
card.ability: {T}: Target land becomes a Plains or an Island until end of turn.
card.flavor: A cross between a jaguar and an armadillo.

card.name: Unnatural Selection
card.ability: {1}: Choose a creature type other than Wall. Target creature becomes that type until end of turn.
card.flavor: What nature makes, magic can modify.
card.ruling: 10/4/2004 : You must choose a creature type that already exists in Magic.

card.name: Urborg Elf
card.ability: {T}: Add {G}, {U}, or {B} to your mana pool.
card.flavor: The elves of Urborg are as deadly and capricious as the swamp itself.

card.name: Urborg Uprising
card.ability:
Return up to two target creature cards from your graveyard to your hand.
Draw a card.
card.flavor: In Urborg, few things are less permanent than death.
card.ruling:
10/4/2004 : You can choose 0, 1, or 2 targets.
10/4/2004 : You do not get to draw a card if you chose at least one target and all targets are illegal on resolution.

card.name: Vindicate
card.ability: Destroy target permanent.
card.flavor:
"Don't mourn for me. This is my destiny."
—Gerrard

card.name: Vodalian Mystic
card.ability: {T}: Target instant or sorcery spell becomes the color of your choice.
card.flavor:
"Sometimes when I look at the ocean, I could swear it changes colors."
—Sisay
card.ruling: 10/4/2004 : It can target spells of type Instant or Sorcery, and not spells of other types that say they can be cast "any time you could cast" an Instant or Sorcery.

card.name: Whirlpool Drake
card.ability:
Flying
When Whirlpool Drake enters the battlefield, shuffle the cards from your hand into your library, then draw that many cards.
When Whirlpool Drake dies, shuffle the cards from your hand into your library, then draw that many cards.

card.name: Whirlpool Rider
card.ability: When Whirlpool Rider enters the battlefield, shuffle the cards from your hand into your library, then draw that many cards.
card.flavor: Where the wind meets the water, change is inevitable.

card.name: Whirlpool Warrior
card.ability:
When Whirlpool Warrior enters the battlefield, shuffle the cards from your hand into your library, then draw that many cards.
{R}, Sacrifice Whirlpool Warrior: Each player shuffles the cards from his or her hand into his or her library, then draws that many cards.

card.name: Wild Research
card.ability:
{1}{W}: Search your library for an enchantment card and reveal that card. Put it into your hand, then discard a card at random. Then shuffle your library.
{1}{U}: Search your library for an instant card and reveal that card. Put it into your hand, then discard a card at random. Then shuffle your library.
card.ruling: 10/4/2004 : You do not have to find an enchantment or Instant card if you do not want to.

card.name: Yavimaya Coast
card.ability:
{T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.
{T}: Add {G} or {U} to your mana pool. Yavimaya Coast deals 1 damage to you.

card.name: Yavimaya's Embrace
card.ability:
Enchant creature
You control enchanted creature.
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has trample.

card.name: Zombie Boa
card.ability: {1}{B}: Choose a color. Whenever Zombie Boa becomes blocked by a creature of that color this turn, destroy that creature. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.
card.flavor: It doesn't need to feed, but still it hungers.
